\u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e network, as you likely have a loose network)\u003c/a\u003e.
